department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
full_summary:
### New and Used Vehicle Data Request for Proposal
#### Solicitation Number: WS4482167456
#### Published Date: April 19, 2024

The Government of Canada, Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of Statistics Canada's Consumer Prices Division (CPD), is seeking a supplier to provide new and used vehicle data for the production of the Consumer Price Index (CPI).

### Request for Proposal Overview
The CPD requires timely and detailed information on vehicle prices and characteristics at the Vehicle Identification Number (VIN) level to produce the CPI. This data will be used to create the new and used vehicle price indexes of the CPI and to inform the Quarterly Income and Expenditure Gross Domestic Product (GDP) and the Provincial and Territorial Economic Accounts.

### Key Information
* **Submission Deadline:** May 30, 2024 at 14:00 EDT
* **Solicitation Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Delivery:** Canada
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Information:**
	+ Name: Matthew Curran (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ Email: matthew.curran@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Notice URL:** https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19338403?extsite=MTkzMzg0MDNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Additional Information
The submission must be made available on or before May 30, 2024 at 14:00 EDT. All responses submitted after this time may be declared non-responsive. The data will be used by Statistics Canada (StatCan) for the production of the CPI and other national accounts. The procurement is being made in accordance with the Government of Canada's procurement policies and procedures. Interested suppliers are encouraged to review the solicitation documents and contact the Contracting Authority, Matthew Curran, for any questions or clarification.  We hope this rewritten entry meets your expectations. Let us know if there is anything else you need our assistance with. Best regards.
